meanings.definition: Able to be reached or accessed.
meanings.sent1: The cookie jar was reachable on the lowest shelf.
meanings.sent2: The playground is reachable by walking a few blocks.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the dangling toy was reachable, but it was just out of reach.
meanings.sent4: The goal of winning the championship seemed reachable after a great start to the season.
meanings.sent5: The treasure chest was just within arm's length, easily reachable for the pirate.

meanings.definition: Capable of being attained or achieved.
meanings.sent1: With hard work, the top score in the class was reachable for Sarah.
meanings.sent2: The dream of becoming a doctor is reachable with dedication to studying.
meanings.sent3: The idea of eating a whole cake in one sitting was reachable for the hungry teenager.
meanings.sent4: The summit of the mountain looked so close, yet so far, seemingly reachable but challenging.
meanings.sent5: The record for the fastest marathon time was just within his grasp, almost reachable.
